name: Frog Golf (Michael Moldovan)
description:
Frog Golf

Submission to the

Mini Jam 106: Frogs²

Had alot of fun making this one.

I think it has potential and will continue to update it into the future.

use arrow keys to pull the frog back + press space/z to release

unless using a controller

up to 8 players supported

hold down mid-jump to roll

**Attention**

-Gamemaker ports terribly to HTML5 so the current HTML5 build is not working-

Update: Seems that Gamemaker 1.4 Syntax is incompatible with HTML5 unless I recode the game from scratch . If you would like to try the game, please download the executable.
